archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Order Handling Organizational Changes
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Establishment and monitoring of organizational arrangements to support deployment and operation of new and/or modified customer order handling infrastructure;
